Paragraph: The results indicate that GFC can exert anticonvulsant activity and reduce the frequency of installation of pilocarpine - induced status epilepticus , as demonstrated by increase in latency to first seizure and decrease in mortality rate of animals .

| --- |
| GFC (Gamma-hydroxybutyric acid) |

In the given paragraph, "GFC" is identified as a chemical entity, specifically Gamma-hydroxybutyric acid. "Pilocarpine" is also identified as a chemical entity.
